name: Save the Goobies
description:
As an ex-pirate who no longer believes in violence, it is your job to save your Goobies from the hypnotized Goobers. Use your *non-aggressive* tools to safely restrict the Goobers and stop MR. GOOB.

Programmers: Hitesh Ahuja, Andres Benitez, Michael Leung

Artists: Johnny Wong, Dongling Yang

Level Designer: Nicholas Lau

Producer/SFX: Michael Phannavong
